title: CCC Theme 1: Oh what a feeling! Toward haptic deepening of affective connections: From neuroscience to design
description: Touch is personal and emotional. Over the last decade, emerging academic and industry knowledge about affective touch has spanned neuroscience, psychology, engineering, physical therapy, entertainment and more. This Cross-Cutting Challenge will describe this emerging area, and the interdisciplinary challenges that must be overcome in order to realize major advances.
